title: 272. Trevor Noah Has a Lot to Say
description: The Daily Show host grew up as a poor, mixed-race South African kid going to three churches every Sunday. So he has a sui generis view of America — especially on race, politics, and religion — and he's not afraid to speak his mind.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
